name: (NSFW) Bio-cross-Dimensional Sight-based Mechanics
description:
YOU MUST BE 18+ TO PLAY

Welcome to a somewhat rambling discussion about games and players, tops and bottoms, actors and subjects.

You will be lectured and asked to make a series of choices according to what you desire. I'm not sure if I'll finish this project. I might if enough interest is shown in a finalized piece.
